entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Layouts block input even when they do not have a background (null background) #19124
    Backlog
  • Problem encountered on https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/maui/first-app-tutorial/create #19123
  • [Testing] SetSemantic tests fails on iOS 17 #19122
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Migration to .NET 8 breaks the Editor control in multiple ways #19121
  • [IOS] .NET 8.0 - Objective-C exception thrown. Name: CALayerInvalidGeometry #19120
    Backlog
  • VisualElement.RotateYTo is broken #19118
    Backlog
  • [Bug] .net8 Android not building because Resources from resx not found. #19117
  • Support the rest of the iOS Drag & Drop Delegates #19116
    Backlog
  • Buttons with DragGestureRecogniser doesn't fire default Command on Android #19111
    Backlog
  • The entry's cursor position is lost when transitioning to the next entry field on iOS only #19109
    Backlog
  • [testing] Enable WebView handler leak tests for iOS 14.5 and 15.4 #19107
    Backlog
  • Keyboard tabbing around a Modal Page cycles focus onto previous page. #19105
    Backlog
  • Cannot build iOS widget apps with extensions (ditto exited with code 1) #19104
  • CollectionView ItemTemplate dont respect the margin of the children items #19103
    Backlog
  • MAUI 8 `TapGestureRecognizer` no longer works on `Button` #19099
    Backlog
  • Shape's stroke is drawing only the external part, the inner part (within the shape area) is not drawing #19095
    Backlog
  • Markup Extension not working inside a ControlTemplate #19094

Closed

  • A button placed under another view cannot be tapped/clicked on iOS and MacCatalyst #15913
    Backlog
  • App crushes when native lib is called (C++ Shared Library project) #19119
    Backlog
  • Default font in WebView is wrong #19114
  • [Windows]Clicking on Snackbar should not open a new instance of the application #19003
  • Javax.Net.Ssl.SSLHandshakeException: #19092
  • TapGesture not working on image when NumberOfTapsRequired > 2 #19108
  • Deploying to iOS crashes with System.IO.FileNotFoundException #14011
  • The main branch is minimized before restoring the window, and the program crashes. #14053
    Backlog
  • Windows Titlebar where Close-Max-Min buttons rendered are different from where they are clickable #15297
  • Update manually Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility to 8 all icons disapper on windows #19096
  • iOS Background Task is not getting executed in every 15 min time #19063
  • CameraView in .net MAUI taking too much time for scanning barcode and QR code #19097

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Added lifecycle methods to UITest #19102
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added methods to set the device orientation from UITests #19100
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19093
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [tests] Ignore InputTransparencyGalleryTests matrix of UITests #19060
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • [tests] Add runs on iOS17 #18962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR1

Updated

  • [ios] update `MemoryAnalyzers` package, add to Controls #18318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Revert "[Blazor] Fix static file handling so that it special cases modules.json (main)" #19079
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Save device logs when UI Tests fail #19085
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18932
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [tests] Ignore WebView leak test on old iOS #19076
    area/controls 🎮
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test E1 #18624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D6 #18728
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D9 #18762
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [Testing] Fix flaky ShapeUpdatesBrushCorrectly test #19047
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add better exception for missing Maps on Windows #19046
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺
